translations: 附加；贴上；增补（append 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Footnotes have been appended to the document.
She appended a note at the end of the letter.
sentences.translation: 她在信件尾部附加了一个说明。

sentences.sentence: It was a relief that his real name hadn't been appended to the manuscript.
sentences.translation: 他的真实姓名没有附加在手稿后面，让人松了口气。
